extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization part of the HPH Sector?

extracted_playbook.title: Review or Establish Business Continuity Plans
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure business continuity plans are in place to maintain essential functions during emergencies, such as cyberattacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Review or Establish Patching Plans and Security Policies
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure patching plans, security policies, and user agreements address current threats posed by malicious cyber actors.

extracted_playbook.title: Evaluate Continuity and Capability
extracted_playbook.description: Identify and address continuity gaps to establish a viable continuity program for functioning during cyberattacks or other emergencies.

extracted_playbook.title: Patch Operating Systems, Software, and Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Patch operating systems, software, and firmware as soon as manufacturers release updates.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Configurations for Operating System Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Check configurations for every operating system version for organization-owned assets to prevent issues from arising.

extracted_playbook.title: Regularly Change Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly change passwords to network systems and accounts and avoid reusing passwords for different accounts.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Multi-Factor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Implement multi-factor authentication where possible.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unused Remote Access/RDP Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Disable unused remote access/Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) ports and monitor remote access/RDP logs.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Application and Remote Access Allow Listing
extracted_playbook.description: Implement allow listing to only allow systems to execute programs known and permitted by the established security policy.

extracted_playbook.title: Audit User Accounts with Administrative Privileges
extracted_playbook.description: Audit user accounts with administrative privileges and configure access controls with least privilege in mind.

extracted_playbook.title: Audit Logs for New Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Audit logs to ensure new accounts are legitimate.

extracted_playbook.title: Scan for Open or Listening Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Scan for open or listening ports and mediate those that are not needed.

extracted_playbook.title: Identify and Backup Critical Assets
extracted_playbook.description: Identify critical assets such as patient database servers, medical records, and telehealth infrastructure; create backups and house them offline.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Network Segmentation
extracted_playbook.description: Implement network segmentation to ensure sensitive data does not reside on the same server and network segment as the email environment.

extracted_playbook.title: Set Antivirus and Anti-Malware Solutions to Auto-Update
extracted_playbook.description: Set antivirus and anti-malware solutions to automatically update and conduct regular scans.

extracted_playbook.title: Regularly Back Up Data and Protect Backup Copies
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly back up data, air gap, and password protect backup copies offline.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement a Recovery Plan
extracted_playbook.description: Implement a recovery plan to maintain and retain multiple copies of sensitive or proprietary data and servers in a physically separate, secure location.

extracted_playbook.title: Focus on User Awareness and Training
extracted_playbook.description: Provide training on information security principles and techniques, and ensure employees know who to contact when they see suspicious activity.

extracted_playbook.title: Do Not Pay Ransoms
extracted_playbook.description: Avoid paying ransoms as it does not guarantee file recovery and may encourage further criminal activity.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is there evidence of a TrickBot infection?

extracted_playbook.title: Back Up and Secure Sensitive Data
extracted_playbook.description: Immediately back up and secure sensitive or proprietary data upon indicators of a TrickBot network compromise.

extracted_playbook.title: Review DNS Logs for TrickBot Indicators
extracted_playbook.description: Review DNS logs and use the XOR key of 0xB9 to decode XOR encoded DNS requests to reveal the presence of Anchor_DNS.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain and Provide Relevant Logs
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain and provide relevant logs upon evidence of a TrickBot infection.
